Name: Shivam Veerabudren
Title: Software Engineer
Bio: Ever since I built my first embedded system project, I've been fascinated by how hardware and software can come together to solve real-world problems. I enjoy turning complex technical challenges into efficient and maintainable solutions. I believe in efficient problem-solving, structured and easily readable code, and continuous learning. My work is driven by curiosity, whether it's learning about new tools and techniques, or improving my skills.
